args.natural_language_statement: Let {x_n} be a convergent monotone sequence of real numbers. Suppose there exists k : ‚Ñï such that lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} x_n = x_k. Show that x_n = x_k for all n ‚â• k.

{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Filter TopologicalSpace
open scoped Topology

/-- Let {x_n} be a convergent monotone sequence of real numbers. Suppose there exists k : ‚Ñï such that lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} x_n = x_k. Show that x_n = x_k for all n ‚â• k. -/
theorem monotone_tendsto_eq_eventually_const (x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (k : ‚Ñï) (hx : Monotone x)
    (h : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù (x k))) : ‚àÄ n ‚â• k, x n = x k := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let (x_n) be a convergent monotone sequence of real numbers. Suppose there exists k : ‚Ñï
such that lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} x_n = x_k. Show that x_n = x_k for all n ‚â• k. -/
theorem monotone_tendsto_eq_eventually_const (x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (k : ‚Ñï) (hx : Monotone x)
  (h : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù (x k))) : ‚àÄ n, n ‚â• k ‚Üí x n = x k := by sorry
